header.title: Use case: Generating an SVG DOM Document

section.title: Introduction
section.p: This page describes the generation of an SVG barcode in Java.

section.title: Preparing the barcode generator configuration
section.p: Barcode4J depends on the Apache Avalon Framework for configuration. So the first step is to prepare an org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.Configuration object. There are several ways to obtain it:

ul.li: In an Avalon-based system you will probably already have Configuration objects around.
You can build it from an XML file:

You can build it from other XML sources such as DOM and SAX events. For more information see the Javadocs from Apache Avalon Framework (look for DefaultConfigurationBuilder and SAXConfigurationHandler).
You can build the Configuration object tree by hand using org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.DefaultConfiguration.
